sentences.en: A tribe of artists live in Greenwich Village.
sentences.cn: 在格林威治村住着许多艺术家.

sentences.en: After the 1884 Convention, Greenwich officially became the place where every day, year and century began.
sentences.cn: 1884年大会以后，格林威治正式成为每一天、每一年及每一世纪开始的地方。

sentences.en: China boasts the world's earliest observatory, built in Nanking in 1385 in the Ming Dynasty ( 1368 A . D . - 1644 A . D . ), three centuries ahead of the Greenwich Observatory built in Britain in 1670.
sentences.cn: 中国建有世界上最早的气象台. 公元1385年,明朝在南京建立观象台, 比英国格林尼治观象台 ( 建于1670年 ) 早三个世纪.

sentences.en: Edward got on the IRT downtown local at 42 nd Street for Greenwich Village.
sentences.cn: 爱德华在42街坐上了站站停的市郊列车前往格林尼治村.

sentences.en: He decided to cut across the Heath, through Greenwich Park.
sentences.cn: 他决定抄近路走格林尼治公园穿过希思区。

sentences.en: I was invited to Greenwich Village to discuss literature and ideas.
sentences.cn: 我被邀请到格林威治村去谈论文学,交流思想.

sentences.en: Its headquarters will soon be relocated from Westminster to the Greenwich site.
sentences.cn: 其总部很快将从威斯敏斯特迁往格林尼治。

sentences.en: Jack was a folk hero in the Greenwich Village bars.
sentences.cn: 在格林尼治村的酒吧里杰克是人们心目中的英雄。

sentences.en: Many of his Greenwich Village associates thought Dylan had sold out to commercialism.
sentences.cn: 迪伦在格林尼治村的许多朋友都认为他已经向商业主义屈服了。

sentences.en: Officials from Greenwich Observatory have the clock checked twice a day.
sentences.cn: 格林威治天文台的职员们每天对大钟检查两次.

sentences.en: Since 1952, the civil time at Greenwich has been called Universal Time.
sentences.cn: 1952年后, 格林威治的民用时,已称为世界时.

sentences.en: Terrestrial longitude is measured in degrees east or west of the Greenwich meridian.
sentences.cn: 地球的经度是用格林尼治子午线向东或向西的度数来表示的.

sentences.en: The line of zero degree longitude passes through Greenwich.
sentences.cn: 经度零度线穿过格林威治.

sentences.en: The longitude of New York is 74 degrees west of Greenwich.

sentences.cn: 他们在格林威治码头靠岸了.

sentences.en: Vincent got on the IRT downtown local at 42 nd Street for Greenwich Village.
sentences.cn: 文森特在42街坐上了站站停的市郊列车前往格林尼治村.

phrases.tran_cn: 格林威治标准时间（等于GMT）

trans.tran_cn: 格林威治（位于英国伦敦东南部，为本初子午线所经之地，原设有英国皇家格林威治天文台），格林威治镇（位于美国康涅狄格州）
